project_descr: A technical assistance facility which provides a rapid and flexible response mechanism to respond to requests for upstream policy support, test innovations with scaling-up potential, to contribute to CPD results and GCS initiatives.

outputs.output_descr: Providing a rapid response facility for upstream policy activities and initiatives
